      Subinterfaces of SimilarityMeasure in eu.monnetproject.sim 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EntitySimilarityMeasure
      Measure calculating the similarity between two ontology entities
      interface  StringSimilarityMeasure
      Measure calculating the similarity between two String values
      interface  TokenSimilarityMeasure
      Measure calculating the similarity between two lists of tokens
